00049          * @retval int32_t zero on success

00060    /**
00061          * Transmit data
00062          * @param addr I2C address of chip
00063          * @param txBuf pointer to transmit buffer
00064          * @param txBufSize size of transmit buffer
00065          * @retval int32_t number of transmitted bytes
00066          */
00067         int32_t write(const uint8_t addr, const uint8_t *txBuf, uint32_t txBufSize);
00068 
00069    /**
00070      * Receive data
00071      * @param addr I2C address of chip
00072      * @param rxBuf pointer to receive buffer
00073      * @param rxBufSize size of receive buffer
00074      * @retval int32_t number of received bytes
00075      */
00076         int32_t read(const uint8_t addr, uint8_t *rxBuf, uint32_t rxBufSize);
00077 
00078    /**
00079          * Send and receive data without a STOP condition between
00080          * @param addr I2C address of chip
00081          * @param txBuf pointer to transmit buffer
00082          * @param txBufSize size of transmit buffer
00083          * @param rxBuf point32_ter to receive buffer
00084          * @param rxBufSize size of receive buffer
00085          * @retval int32_t number of received bytes
00086          */
00087         int32_t writeRead(const uint8_t addr, const uint8_t *txBuf, uint32_t txBufSize, uint8_t *rxBuf, uint32_t rxBufSize);
